quotes.quote: A good speech has a beginning, a middle and an end, the best example being, "I love you.
If I love you, what business is it of yours?

We should remember that saying â€˜I love you' is only a beginning. We need to say it, we need to mean it, and most importantly we need consistently to show it. We need to both express and demonstrate love.
Saying 'I love you' only takes seconds, but proving it takes a lifetime.
You could put all the hearts together in the world and that still wouldn't describe how much I love you.
I love you. You annoy me more than I ever thought possible. But I want to spend every irritating minute with you.
So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
Immature love says: â€˜I love you because I need you.' Mature love says â€˜I need you because I love you
If I tell you I love you, can I keep you forever?
Love is not a trade, I love you because you love me; I love you because I love you.
I love you and that's the beginning and end of everything.
If I know what love is, it is because of you.
Man loves money, bees love honey, flowers love dew, and I love you!
It's easy to say, â€˜I love you,' to someone, but it's more meaningful to thank someone for loving you.
Yesterday I loved you the most I could love anyone, yet today I love you even more.
I love you more than my own skin.
I have a tongue like a rose petal, and when I say I love you, it has the fragrance of truth. My words are my garden, and I'm planting our future
The regret of my life is that I have not said â€˜I love you' often enough.
I love you more than I think I should.
Say â€œI love youâ€ to those you love. The eternal silence is long enough to be silent in, and that awaits us all.
I love you just the way you are.
I love you more than there are fishes in the sea, and higher than the moon.
I love you like a fat kid loves cake.
I love you, and I will love you until I die, and if there's a life after that, I'll love you then.
It takes three seconds to say I love you. Three hours to explain it and a lifetime to prove it.
I love you more than any word can say â€¦ I love you more than every action I take â€¦ I'll be right here loving you till the end.
When someone says "I love you",  watch their actions more than their words.
I love you more than I have ever found a way to say to you.
I loved you enough to let you stumble, fall, hurt, and fail.
For you see, each day I love you more. Today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
I love you so, But why I love you, I'll never know.
If I could write a letter using the sky as my paper, the ocean for my ink, and the stars as my words, it would still not be enough to describe how much I love you.
I promise to love you forever - every single day of forever.
I Love you with the breath, the smiles and the tears of all my life.
You could put all the hearts together in the world and that still wouldn't describe how much I love you.
The words â€˜I Love You' kill, and resurrect millions, in less than a second.
I have loved you all my life, it has just taken me this long to find you.
I swear I couldn't love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.
I love you the way a drowning man loves air. And it would destroy me to have you just a little.
I love you, not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
There are never enough I Love You's.
I loved you yesterday. I love you still. I always have and I always will.
I love you sounds best spoken in quiet acts of kindness.
I love thee to the depth and breadth and height my soul can reach.
There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.

I love you also means I love you more than anyone loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that no one loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also,  I love you in a way that I love no one else, and never have loved anyone else, and never will love anyone else.
He's more myself than I am. Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
The heart has its reasons which reason knows not.
I want to do with you what spring does with the cherry trees.
Lovers alone wear sunlight.
For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
If you press me to say why I loved him, I can say no more than because he was he, and I was I.
You and you alone make me feel that I am alive. Other men it is said have seen angels, but I have seen thee, and thou art enough.
I'd rather die tomorrow than live a hundred years without knowing you.
It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous that you realize just how much you love them.
The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.
The greater the love, the greater the tragedy when it's over.
O often when we say, 'I love you,' we say it with a huge 'I' and a little 'you.'
If you love me as I love you, / What knife can cut our love in two?

No one shall part us from each other, / One if life and death are we: / All in all to one another— / I to thee and thou to me! / Thou the tree and I the flower— / Thou the idol; I the throng— / Thou the day and I the our— / Thou the singer; I the song!
The birthday of my life Is come, my love has come to me.
The simple lack of her is more to me than other's presence.
I chose my wife, as she did her wedding gown, not for a fine glossy surface, but such qualities as would wear well.
With my lost saints,— I love thee with the breath, / Smiles, tears, of all my life!— and if God choose, I shall but love thee better after death.
The first time I saw you I knew it was true. That I'd love you forever and that's what I'll do. Believe in love at first sight.
Love wants nothing from the other but wants everything for the other.
Love means this: When you suffer,  I feel the pain.
You and I: we are one. I cannot hurt you without hurting myself.
I had rather hear my dog bark at a crow than a man swear he loves me.
When love is not madness, it is not love.
Don't be so much in love that you can't tell when it's raining.

We met, we lived, and dear we loved / Then came that fateful day / The love that felt so dear / Fades so far away / Tonight we both are all alone / And here's all that I can say / I love you still and always will / But that's the price we had to pay.
And one day I found you / I fell in love / I chose you / Now I see and feel / You are my life and soul / My love and goal.
I said 'I love you' thinking that's how I felt / Knowing deep down I was confused. / I said 'I love you' thinking that's what I was supposed to say, not knowing the real meaning of love.
